resources.string: App created by [[tri|TrianguloY]]. This app is not affiliated with WhatsApp Inc.
Thanks to %n for providing the %l locale translation!
Do you want to help with a translation? You can find more information here:
You can change the app language by clicking the button below (the app will be restarted).
Only locales available [[lcl|in your device]] are installed, to reduce app size.

"This app uses WhatsApp public api to open a chat with any number you enter. No contact is created on the device. More info [[wfq|here]].
Insert the number and the [[prf|prefix]] with no extra characters, only numbers 0–9. More info [[hlp|here]]. You can click on the territory button to choose from a list. Example: for +44 (UK) 123 456 7890 write 44 1234567890"
Use this to create a link that will open WhatsApp when clicked. You can specify a number and/or a message that will be placed on the input box (will NOT, I repeat, will NOT send the message).
Being a free without ads nor purchases app, the progress and updates are based on the reception and support from you.
It appears you are using the app for business purposes. Please consider [[spt|supporting]], thanks.\n\n[[hdb|Discard]]
It appears you have been using the app for quite some time. Please consider [[spt|supporting]], thanks.\n\n[[hdb|Discard]]
With this addon you can allow this app to show a list of unknown recent calls to click. Don\'t worry: it\'s free, smaller than a picture, and no ads.
Message that will be autocompleted, NOT sent.

"With this option you can delete all the app data (settings, recents, etc) and restore the default behaviour. Useful to test if the app stopped working due to wrong configuration. This is equivalent to uninstalling+reinstalling the app.
Do you want to DELETE ALL THE DATA of the app?
The app will close. Next time you open it'll behave as a fresh install."
Remove leading zeros from the prefix and number
Save recent numbers/messages. (disabling it will clear saved ones)
Hide the help text from the main screen
Keep a default message (also enables advanced mode by default):
Open automatically when a number is autofilled (share, call, recent or clipboard).

string-array.name: chl_openable
string-array.item: Default: Uses the Android WhatsApp scheme
Web: Uses the web scheme, may show browsers too
SMS: Uses a sms-related intent, may show other messaging apps too [note: sending text doesn\'t seem to be always supported]
Predefined: Ensures that it works for official WhatsApp and WhatsApp Business apps.
[DANGER] JID: Uses an internal WhatsApp scheme. Using this mode is discouraged as numbers seems to not be checked for existence

resources.string: This mode uses an undocumented WhatsApp intent and may stop working or do so incorrectly. Unless already fixed, it seems to avoid checking for valid numbers so a chat will open even if the number doesn\'t exist. Note that using this mode is discouraged because of unknown consequences.\n\nContinue at your own risk?

Note that, in order for a number to be opened with the t.me/+123 link, the user must set it as "publicly visible" and allow being found by it. And almost no one does that.\nSo, unless you know the person, I assure you this option is useless (Telegram doesn\'t even say that the number couldn\'t be opened, it simply opens the main screen as normal without errors).\nYou can still try it, but you\'ve been warned.
Experimental generic intent support:\nEach valid line will be parsed as an intent to open. Use \'%number%\' as a placeholder for the input number, and \'%message%\' for the input message.
Use light theme (the app will restart)

The link you are going to share contains the entered phone number in plain text. Everyone with access to the link will have access to the number. If it is a personal number don\'t share the link publicly.
Do you want to remove all recents?
No unknown numbers found or couldn\'t be read
Limit the recent unknown calls to reduce loading time (requires addon V1.2+). Set to 0 to show all:
The addon was detected, but its signature doesn\'t match [Error %d]. Please make sure you have installed it from the official page (and this app from the Play Store)
Instant apps can only open the default app. If you have multiple versions (like WhatsApp and WhatsApp Business) try installing the [[oiw|full app]] (note: not all versions are supported).
The \'%s\' feature isn\'t available in an instant app. If you want to use it please install the app from the Play Store.

string-array.name: chl_notify
string-array.item: Notify on new important features only
